bibl.title: A Marriage Contract: Aspects of Latin-Greek Language Contact (P. Mich. VII 434 and P.Ryl. IV 612 = ChLA IV 249)
bibl.note: P. Mich. VII, 434 + P. Ryl. IV, 612 (= C.P.L. 208-209). - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Papyrus and the Scribe. - 3. Philadelphia and the Identification of Nomissianus. - 4. Greek and Latin Marriage Contracts. - 5. Linguistic Analysis. - 6. Syntax. - 7. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: 145.5 P. Mich. VII, 434 + P. Ryl. IV, 612
LEIWO Martti and Hilla HALLA-AHO, A Marriage Contract: Aspects of Latin-Greek Language Contact (P. Mich. VII 434 and P. Ryl. IV 612 = ChLA IV 249). Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Mich. VII, 434 + P. Ryl. IV, 612 (= C.P.L. 208-209). - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Papyrus and the Scribe. - 3. Philadelphia and the Identification of Nomissianus. - 4. Greek and Latin Marriage Contracts. - 5. Linguistic Analysis. - 6. Syntax. - 7. Conclusion.
